title: Arbiter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose to open a Third Party Chat tonight, where all Neutral players talk together anonymously. They are marked by their role-name instead. Three uses.
- During the day, also choose to Mob a player (can be done consecutively with Third Party Chat). All Neutral players have the option to visit that player (and won't perform their ability on them), and each Neutral visitor will power-up your ability:

fields.name: Mob Effects:
fields.value:
Innate: Roleblock targeted player.
+1 Neutral Visitor: Targeted visitor is instead controlled into a second target of your choice.
+2 Neutral Visitors: Targeted visitor also gets +4 votes during the day tommorow.
+3 Neutral Visitors: Targeted visitor receives a basic rampage and you clean all visitors (but won't attack Neutrals).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know the names and roles of all Neutrals or Neutral Factions (ie: Peasants)
- You cannot attack other Neutrals under any circumstance (including being controlled)
- While you are alive, Neutral players win if the Peasants do as well, as long as the Neutral player has participated in at least one Mob.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live to see a Neutral faction win (Your Destiny is considered fulfilled as soon as every other Peasants' Destiny is fulfilled.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4314
*When processing this faction don't forget Peasants are considered Neutrals*
